DOC.brief_title: Induced Controlled Dietary Ketosis Regulator Obesity Metabolic Syndrome Pathologies
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose -Assessment prolong , physiological , dietary ketosis pathological process induce metabolic syndrome ( MetS ) include reduction fast triglyceride , BMI body fat mass , significant decrease and/or normalization HgA1c increase rest metabolic rate . Design - Qualitative Setting - Bristlecone Health , Inc. , Maple Grove , Minnesota Subjects - 30 adult previously diagnose MetS randomly prescribe one three group : sustain ketogenic diet exercise , participant 's normal diet exercise , participant 's normal diet 3-5 day per week exercise 30 minute . Intervention - 10-week diet control glycemic index provide ketogenic group ; group maintain normal diet . Baseline triglyceride , HgA1c , VO2 max , body mass index ( BMI ) , rest metabolic rate ( RMR ) , blood ketone level body fat mass measurement assess three group week 0 week 3 , 6 10 . Measures - ANOVA follow test pairwise difference use Tukey 's HSD correction . Analysis - Five seven variable ketogenic group show statistically significant difference week 0 10 data point .
